meanings.definition: To expel from the stomach; vomit.
meanings.sent1: After eating too much candy, he spues in the bathroom.
meanings.sent2: The sick child spues all over the floor.
meanings.sent3: The cat spues up a hairball on the carpet.
meanings.sent4: The overflowing river spues debris onto the banks.
meanings.sent5: The volcano spues molten lava into the air.

meanings.definition: To eject or discharge in a stream or jet.
meanings.sent1: The broken pipe spues water into the air.
meanings.sent2: The whale spues water from its blowhole.
meanings.sent3: The fountain spues water in a graceful arc.
meanings.sent4: The fire hydrant spues water onto the street.
meanings.sent5: The geyser spues steam and hot water high into the sky.

meanings.definition: To gush forth in a stream or jet.
meanings.sent1: The burst dam spues water downstream.
meanings.sent2: The pressure washer spues soap onto the car.
meanings.sent3: The burst balloon spues confetti everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The burst pipe spues steam into the room.
meanings.sent5: The shaken soda can spues soda all over the kitchen.
